DOC.detailed_description: During past year conflict different study regard correlation intercourse pregnancy early labor . Brustman et al show woman high risk early delivery intercourse early labor significantly increase uterine activity compare woman low risk . Petridou et al show risk significantly high week 33 gestation . However , Cochrane Library summary leaf question correlation intercourse early labor unanswered . In Sayle et al 's study show correlation early delivery intercourse . In 2004 Oguma describe 3 polymorphism Prostanoid receptor gene . These polymorphism correlate increased activity smooth muscle bronchi asthma .
